Topic: Draw two habitats and the different living things in each
Evidence Statements: The student can identify and illustrate two different habitats, one on land and one in water.
The student can draw various types of living things found in each habitat, such as plants and animals.
The student can make comparisons between the types of living things in the two different habitats.
The student can demonstrate the diversity of life by depicting different kinds of plants and animals in each habitat.
The student can organize their drawing to clearly show patterns of plant and animal diversity across the habitats.
